page.title: 16URBAN DEVELOP.BIGGIN HILL.
page.content: Landscape in our area. Biggin Hill is approximately 20 miles from London and one hour from the coast. The major shopping centres are Bromley and Croydon. Biggin Hill is situated by a valley with steep sides. Most of the residential part is built on the steep sides and the bottom of the valley. There are farms in the surrounding area, where it is easier to farm the land. There are lots of farms in our neighbourhood. The farms don't grow many crops other than grass, there are quite a lot of farm animals. Most people live within 5 minutes walk from farmland. A large number of houses have a field at the end of their gardens.
